sources.title: Inside Job (1946)
sources.description: A pair of married ex-convicts trying to go straight get jobs at a department store. A gangster who knows about their past threatens to expose it unless they agree to help him rob the department store. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/inside-job-1946/

metadata.Plot: A pair of married ex-convicts trying to go straight get jobs at a department store. A gangster who knows about their past threatens to expose it unless they agree to help him rob the department store.
metadata.Writer: George Bricker, Tod Browning, Garrett Fort
metadata.Actors: Preston Foster, Ann Rutherford, Alan Curtis
